Title: Enrol children in schools or serve jail term, Gombe govt tells parents
Summary: The Gombe State government has warned parents that failure to enrol their children in schools could result in a two-month jail term or substantial fines . Failure to enrol children in school or serve jail term, the state government tells parents .

Title: Rivers: Stakeholders call for probe of Ibas’ six-month administration
Summary: Stakeholders call for probe of former Rivers State Sole Administrator, former Vice Admiral Ibok-Ette Iba . Iba oversaw the affairs of the state for six months .

Title: Tension in Edo LGs as acting chairmen receive impeachment notices
Summary: There was tension in Edo State local councils as indications emerged of a possible impeachment, resignation, or suspension of the current council acting chairmen following the swearing in of some ward councillors elected last Saturday .

Title: Experts seek holistic reforms as Nigeria braces for digital economy shift
Summary: Experts have stressed the need for a comprehensive and integrated approach to Nigeria’s burgeoning digital economy, focusing particularly on the crucial sectors of taxation, banking, and finance . Experts seek holistic reforms as Nigeria braces for digital economy shift .

Title: FG begins verification of disputed oil fields in N’Delta
Summary: FG begins verification of disputed and newly drilled oil and gas fields in the Niger Delta region . The Revenue Mobilisation Allocation and Fiscal Commission (RMAFC) has embarked on the verification .

Title: House of Reps shifts resumption to October 7
Summary: House of Reps shifts resumption of plenary sessions from September 23 to October 7, 2025 . The House of Representatives has postponed its planned resumption by two weeks . The resumption is scheduled for Tuesday, September 23, 2025.

Title: Benue attack: 8 more bodies of Police recovered from attack scene —LG Chairman
Summary: Eight more bodies of the Police personnel killed last Friday in an ambush by a combined team of armed herdsmen and local militia gangs have been recovered . The team made up Police personnel and members of the Benue State Civil Protection Guards .

Title: No visa for corrupt Nigerian officials — US Mission
Summary: Reform UK said it would abolish the right of migrants to qualify for permanent settlement in the UK after five years, if it wins the next election . The US Mission in Nigeria vowed to bar corrupt, high-profile individuals from entering the United States .

Title: Apapa Customs targets 200 containers hourly scan to facilitate trade, cargo clearance
Summary: Apapa Customs targets 200 containers hourly scan to facilitate trade, cargo clearance . Comptroller Oluwadare Oshoba, Customs Area Controller of the Apapa Port Command, has called on port users and stakeholders to prepare for a more seamless trade process .

Title: Nigeria’s GDP records 4.23 % growth in Q2’25
Summary: Nigeria recorded 4.23 percent Gross Domestic Product growth in the second quarter of 2025 (Q2’25) from 3.13 per cent in first quarter,Q1'25 . This represents a 1.1 percentage point quarter-on-quarter (QoQ) increase . •As non-oil sector contributes 95%
